_header: A great clerk Damascene great writ / How Saint Barlaam
Title(s): Barlaam and Josaphat ; Northern Homily Cycle
_description: Barlaam and Josaphat — from the Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: A grete clerk Damacene gert writhow saint barlam þe gude hermit…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …siluer & golde he gert furth bringpelure perre & riche clothing…
BLHar4196.Note: Ends incomplete at bottom of colum.
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden.
         Paderborn: F. Schoningh, 1875: 226-40.
MacDonald,  K. S.,
                        ed.  
             The Story of Barlaam and Joasaph, Buddhism and Christianity.
         Calcutta, 1895: app. 12.
